welcome_message_body: Welcome to Brownhills, a charming town known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the 'BHX Free WiFi' network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at East Midlands Airport is one of the busiest in the UK, handling a variety of goods and shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with a limit of 4 hours per device per day.
